posts.text: The expert: Yang Yuhui national two CounselorsAt 21:19 on August 8th, 7 earthquake occurred in Sichuan County, Aba Prefecture, Jiuzhaigou. The stars of micro-blog to pray for the disaster, but due to the recent “wolf 2” netizens much attention Wu Jing also issued a document called: “pray for peace zone!” Micro-blog, triggered a large number of users of the message, netizens to “wolf 2” at the box office on the grounds that “forced donations for the earthquake” Wu Jing. Also a lot of friends just for Wu Jing, called the “forced donation” not in the moral kidnapping of Wu Jing. In response to this, Wu Jing himself did not respond to these voices, in fact… Wu Jing has quietly donated one million! So, why are there so many “forced donors”? What kind of psychology are they? Is it true that, as netizens say, is a moral kidnapping?In the “forced donors” in the eyes of this matter, generally can be divided into three kinds of psychological: 1, your money is to earn everyone, so you donate money is tantamount to my contribution.I have bought something on Taobao, so Ma money I have; I was in the cinema to see the wolf 2, so Wu Jingzuan’s money is my job. So far, the logic is not a problem, but the robber logic: you earn my money, so I can be “God” as required to dispose of the money, so you money is my money. Letting others do what they are looking for and satisfying their emotions, which psychology calls “projection”, makes people feel at ease. Altruistic Psychology: sociobiology believes that altruism is an instinct for animals to exchange their self sacrifice in exchange for the existence and continuation of species.” Instinct is what is in the genes that we depend on to survive. This later evolved into a theory of Psychology: when we see someone who needs help, we are willing to help, or psychology will cause anxiety.2, if you have money, you must do good.This is typical of the “absolute” cognition, there are many similar examples in real life: I must be admitted to a university, or my life will be over; I love you so you must be good to me, and I do not get married or not; I am your father, so you must listen to me…… Although it is a wrong cognition, it is stubborn and universal in the human brain. We can only get rid of this erroneous cognitive control only by improving our self-cultivation, and constantly self-awareness, self reflection. Value embodiment: psychologist Maslow put forward that the highest level of psychological needs of human beings is the realization of self-worth, which is higher than the physiological needs, higher social psychological needs. To realize self value, simply speaking, is to make contribution to society and obtain the affirmation of others. “Donation” is the realization of self-worth in a broader sense.3, herd mentality, everyone is not strange a kind of psychology.In the forced donation army, some people are wrong to recognize, they are “sincere” request star donations. At the same time, there is a considerable group, is “merry”: anyway, has been put forward, I followed shouted, if forced to donate is invalid, I do not damage what; but if you donate, it is under pressure or in the heart, I would think is forced anyway, so to experience pressure, “successful” feeling.What? Morality? First I am not leading, second of our number, all you know? In the process of conformity, people’s moral sense will be reduced. This kind of “small investment, big profit” business is no wonder that attracts a lot of people to follow. Herd mentality: social psychology holds that people tend to have a herd mentality, which refers to the tendency of people to adopt the behavior and opinions of other members of the group. Under the guidance of herd mentality, people tend to lower their ability to think independently.How to treat Wu Jing’s “moral forced donation”?First of all, recognize your heart. Happy in doing good Chinese is a traditional virtue, in the case of ability, to help more people, is a manifestation of inner cultivation, to the roses, hand a fragrance, not only benefit each other, they will also gain greater psychological satisfaction. Second, recognize your responsibilities. Recognize their own social responsibility, “the greater the ability, the greater the responsibility”, this responsibility is willing to take. It is the burden, not the responsibility, that others impose.Once again, recognize your role. Charity is their own business, since September 1, 2016 China’s implementation of the new “charity law”, the general called “charity event, refers to a natural person voluntarily carried out public welfare activities, from this point of view, no one can force you to do what.There is no need to condemn a forced donor,Because that’s their heartThere is no need to worry about being forced,Just follow your heartEverything comes from the heartPlease support us like review This article is from Phoenix, representing Phoenix from the media point of view.

A hotel gate damaged by an earthquake near Jiuzhaigou Scenic AreaIt’s not difficult to do that, because Jiuzhaigou is a scenic spot for fees and gates, and you can count the number of visitors per day depending on the number of tickets or the electronic gate data.In contrast, the real difficulty, it is one that is free of charge area, especially without a barrier, how to get the number of tourists scenic spots.According to the “tourism law”, the tourist attractions are required to publish the maximum carrying capacity of tourists. Passenger flow monitoring has always been one of the focal points of scenic spots. On the one hand, it is to avoid the potential safety problems caused by overloading passenger traffic, on the other hand, it is also the protection of tourism environment and resources.West Lake scenic spots, for example, have been popular with tourists since ancient times. Zhang Daiceng of the Ming Dynasty complained, “West Lake, in the July half, there is nothing to see but to look at the people in the July.”. In 2002, West Lake became the first national 5A scenic spots free of charge. After the demolition of the wall hedgerow, West Lake administrative committee also regularly publish data of tourists. West Lake tourists during the peak seasonEstimation method does not rely on any equipment than the original is point measurement, generally at the entrance or area is an important tourist data acquisition point.For example, in the National Day holiday travel peak, West Lake scenic area will send two security guards in the broken bridge on the number of heads. The thoughtfulness is that the staff will avoid the antipathy of tourists, only in mind. 5 minutes, roughly from the bridge to the end of the bridge, to collect the number of visitors on the bridge briefly. The 5 minute sample, multiplied by 12, is the total number of visitors in an hour. From 7 to 19, sampling 12 times a day adds up to the total number of visitors during the day. And night time from 19 to 7 when the amount of tourists, usually in the daytime 30%.Card counting can only be compared to the scale, a rough estimate of the crowd, the infrared sensor is a more convenient and accurate method. This method is achieved by detecting the number of human bodies passing through the sensing area by infrared devices, and by measuring the resistance changes that block the infrared, or the specific infrared rays emitted by the human body, to determine the number of people. Two infrared receivers can be set up in the entrance and exit area to form a monitoring box, which can be judged to be “out” and “go” according to the order. The automatic change can be realized and the number of visitors can be counted in real time.Infrared induction has the advantages of moderate cost and small equipment. However, this measurement method is sensitive to congestion, and the statistical accuracy is greatly affected by the location of infrared sensitive devices, and it can not distinguish whether or not to count repeatedly.After the development of image recognition technology, video analysis has become the most mainstream method of passenger flow statistics. Video analysis not only can generate more accurate passenger flow data, but also can follow the moving track of the target, and form passenger flow.Video analysis usually acquires images by vertical and high-precision cameras, and then judges population density based on image features. The population density is low, the image of man’s head and shoulders as feature points to determine the direct output of the recognition results; in the population density is high, can the image background area or to compute the trajectories of people. Video analysis method will be disturbed by the umbrella, shadows, dark floors and other factors, but the overall accuracy is very high, can reach more than 95%. Can also be used to calculate the flow of shopping malls counting toolsIn addition, in the current construction of scenic spots in the background, mobile phone signaling and Wi-Fi probe is also a common means of population estimation. Mobile phone signaling through operators to continuously track the user’s location and status; Wi-Fi probe is a mobile device identification open Wi-Fi function, can be detected without connecting equipment position. However, if a person carrying many intelligent devices, or is not open Wi-Fi function will cause the error.Therefore, tourist attractions usually combine various means to estimate the amount of tourists and check and correct them.However, the use of these statistical methods, in conjunction with the calculations for other large groups of people, is different from the standpoint of the statistical parties, and the results are also very different.By the end of 2016 held repeatedly called for President Park Geun hye down weekend candlelight rally in parts of South Korea, the new year’s eve of the sixth round of the rally has created a number of record highs. Organizers said more than 1 million 100 thousand people attended the rally in Seoul, the largest in South Korea’s constitutional history. The police estimate, that night about 65 thousand people attended the rally in Seoul - the difference between the number of times. One of the reasons for the statistical discrepancy was that the organizers calculated the cumulative number, including those who left early before the end of the rally, while police posted instantaneous data for the night.Among the number of people gathered, the most famous is the Jacobs Jacobs Method in the United States (Herbert). In 1960s, Professor Jacobs observed on campus in the office of anti war protests, the checkerboard cement thought of a simple method: calculate the number of samples in the grid, get the average number per cell, multiplied by the total number of squares, get the total number of approximate value.So far, Jacobs’s method still occupies a guiding position in the number of meetings. Jacobs will “loose” crowd density defined in 10 square feet (0.93 square meters / person), “the crowd” at the density of 4.5 square feet (0.42 square meters / person), “the reception area extremely dense crowd” similar to a rock concert (mosh-pit) density is 2.5 square feet (0.23 / person square meters).At present, the United States, South Korea, Singapore and Malaysia still use this method to calculate the number of meetings: the assembly site will be divided into grid, according to the degree of density, multiplied by the number of units per unit area. The accuracy of the method depends on the division result of gathering area and population density of judgment, however, with satellite images and Earth images with the help of Google, the statistical results accuracy has been steadily.In addition, Korean scholars also calculate the number of candles according to the number of candlelight in the surveillance screen. According to the observation, about half of the protesters hold candles, and estimate the streets around Chong Wa Dae, the number of rallies is about 500 thousand to 700 thousand people. posts.text: At present, toothpaste on the market can be divided into ordinary toothpaste and special effect toothpaste. First of all, let’s first understand the ingredients of toothpasteNo matter what toothpaste, its main ingredients are friction agents, and other foaming agents, moisturizers, adhesives, aromatics, water and other additives, etc., to varying degrees of tooth massage, friction. Commonly used friction agents are calcium carbonate, calcium hydrogen phosphate and calcium pyrophosphate. Among them, calcium friction strong, more for the removal of stains and smoke stains.How much is the difference between a few bucks and dozens of blocks of toothpaste?Both pieces of toothpaste, or dozens of toothpaste, main ingredients are similar, are for the benefit of cleaning teeth, the effect of the difference is not particularly large. When buying toothpaste, we must not just look at the price, that the higher the price, and do not blindly believe that all types of advertising, because advertising is easy to exaggerate the unique ingredients.Especially some drug toothpaste, in some oral diseases does play a role in mitigation, but is not a substitute for drugs, can not really put your treatment of oral diseases, so we should not be misled by these.Toothpaste is mainly a supporting role, brushing method is the most important, followed by the toothbrush. Now many people turn this order around. Bleeding gums, periodontal disease is the swelling performance, to scaling treatment ah, with toothpaste is only temporary relief, cover condition, with oral disease, should be timely medical treatment.Besides water, the main component of ordinary toothpaste is the following:1, friction agent2 surfactant (simple to understand is the cleaning agent or foaming agent)3, fluorideOther minor components include: pH regulator, stabilizer or adhesive, sweeteners, and some pigment. Efficacy type toothpaste, such as anti allergy, whitening, drug type, but also add the corresponding functional ingredients. “Puzzle one: toothpaste, the most important thing is to choose the friction agent?Completely correct. The friction agent in toothpaste accounted for 30% - 55%, as a kind of insoluble particles by brushing the action, remove plaque and calculus from the teeth, to reduce dental caries and oral diseases.Friction agent is calcium carbonate, calcium phosphate, aluminum hydroxide, and silicate hydrate (silica).“Puzzle two: the fewer bubbles, the better the toothpastePart right! Toothpaste has no problem with foaming agents. The problem is that it contains SLS foaming agents!SLS is an even be added to the shampoo and Cleansing Cream will despise ingredients in toothpaste use is certainly not what good.The use of SLS is supposed to make a protective layer of oral tissue becomes dry, and thus damage the oral tissue, increase the frequency of the occurrence of oral ulcers, can cause allergic cold teeth.So well intentioned experts suggest better and less foaming toothpaste, refers not containing SLS or SLS content of toothpaste better. In fact, you don’t need to judge by blistering. You can see that the label on the toothpaste has “SLS free” or “SLS free”, and the logo is ok. “Puzzle three: fluoride in toothpaste is unsafe?Incorrect! First, do not demonize fluoride, which is a naturally occurring mineral. Fluoride can strengthen tooth enamel and tooth mineral re.ADA (American Dental Association was founded in 1859, professional dental organization, with China’s “national NCOH” is not the same ah) has been recognized by the effect of fluoride toothpaste, and all ADA certified toothpaste is fluoride toothpaste.We only need to remember two points:1, currently on the market most of the toothpaste will add a low dose of fluoride, recommend everyone with a fluoride toothpaste. Because low doses of fluoride strengthen the surface of the teeth, not only can they prevent cavities, but they also do little harm to the body.2, fluorosis, dental fluorosis? Swallowing toothpaste and fluoride into the body can be harmful to health. Of course, I’ve heard of it, but it’s still the old saying that when you talk about the poison, you’re playing a hooligan. If you really want to count it, you’ll have to eat a whole tube of toothpaste to be harmful to your health. Therefore, even children should use fluoride toothpaste, as long as the control of the amount of toothpaste every time you go.“Puzzle four: About whitening toothpaste?Whitening toothpaste mainly through these two ways to make teeth look white: one is through the removal of stains of tooth surface, as far as possible to restore the original luster; two is the whitening toothpaste paste is often blue, blue pigment can be temporarily attached on the surface of the teeth, make teeth to look more white, this is appearance oh. These whitening effect is only temporary, after stopping toothpaste, will restore the essence of the teeth. “Puzzle five: about gum bleeding, use xx toothpaste?Bleeding gums, with XX toothpaste, advertising too much, think of bleeding gums subconscious: I need to change the hemostatic function of toothpaste. But, that’s no use at all! When brushing gums bleeding is warning: Master of dental calculus too much, need girls help me to a good.Bleeding teeth this is the early symptoms of gingivitis or periodontitis, gingival shows in a very fragile state. If you use the hemostatic toothpaste, although the blood stopped, but your gums did not improve, dental calculus still exists. Thus, in the long-term stimulation of dental calculus, gingival recession, tooth root exposure, tooth loss, problems ensued. So, brush your teeth and bleed. Don’t worry about changing toothpaste. What you really need is love from the dentist.“Puzzle six: about toothpaste sensitive to teeth?Anti sensitive toothpaste, there is a role for people with sensitive teeth. People with sensitive teeth have many small holes in their teeth leading to the pulp. And the pulp is the center of the tooth nerve, so these tubes can transmit cold, sweet and sour stimulation to the tooth nerve, causing tooth sensitivity and pain. These types of toothpaste form a protective layer on the surface of the teeth, sealing the tiny surface defects of the teeth, thereby relieving tooth sensitivity. “Puzzle seven: does toothpaste contain three chlorine? Is it safe?Controversial, best avoided! Three chlorine (triclosan) is also a controversial ingredient in toothpaste. Three triclosan is an antibacterial agent that is commonly used in toothpaste, soap, hand sanitizer and medical disinfectant products.On safety of three triclosan, the United States and Europe over the past 10 years has been a lot of controversy round, there is not a conclusion. However, say three chlorine will cause cancer, basically did not find any evidence, has been denied.Why for three chlorine in toothpaste students without excessive worry?Because the first, currently containing three triclosan toothpaste quantity is less than 10%, but from the amount, add the standard limit of domestic and American European consistent.Second, from the manufacturer perspective, three triclosan is an expensive raw materials, there is no need to add too much.But still suggest that, given the risk of three triclosan is relatively large, the effect is not irreplaceable, as the consumer must avoid containing three triclosan toothpaste! Finally, not for a long time with a toothpaste toothpaste do not hold too longLong-term use of a toothpaste can cause some harmful oral bacteria resistance and drug resistance, so that the toothpaste lost teeth sterilization effect, the best alternative use of toothpaste.Toothpaste with longer exposure in the air more opportunities, and the contact frequency of toothbrush is higher, will increase the chance of exposure to bacteria.The finally, toothpaste is mainly auxiliary function method and toothbrush is the main effect, only serious and correct brushing to keep the mouth clean is the hard truth!This article is from Phoenix, representing Phoenix from the media point of view.

posts.text: Original title: another example of excessive interpretation: AIDS vaccine will come? It’s still early!It’s too long to see1, this is an important study. So far, only 4 HIV vaccine concepts have been tested for human effectiveness in the world so far, and Johnson’s vaccine will soon become the fifth.2, however, “producing an immune response” does not mean achieving effective protection and prevention of aids.3, this study is still in its early stages, large-scale clinical trials have not yet been done, and the listing will take longer.4, wear a suit, wear a suit, and wear it.Author: Er vermicelliEdit: OdetteToday, several media reports, Johnson announced in July 24th the world’s first HIV vaccine human clinical trials “,” volunteers of HIV vaccine was well tolerated, and produced antibodies against HIV 100%”. Therefore, also received a lot of friends on the phone, ask the news, and some of them are infected, it seems that the vaccine will be listed in two days.For a while, the mood is complicated. On the one hand, it was good to see the public’s concern about the disease, the prevention, and especially the vaccine; on the other hand, worried about the negative effects of misunderstandings about the findings, and decided to talk about it.To put it simply, this is not the first human vaccine in the world to test HIV vaccines, and it is also a relatively early result. Having volunteers produce an immune response does not mean that the vaccine can prevent aids. From the really wide range of AIDS vaccine, we still have a long way to go. Photograph: 123rf.com.cnThis experimentWhat does that really mean?In July 24th, the results of an early clinical trial known as APPROACH appeared at the Ninth International AIDS Society conference in Paris. This test is based on the “mosaic” AIDS vaccine project participants, including the United States, Rwanda, Uganda, South Africa and Thailand in 393 healthy adults, they were randomly assigned to receive one of the 7 kinds of vaccine or placebo (note to vaccinated subjects is not a virus, but after processing and verification of security the vaccine in animal experiments), completed the 4 dose vaccination in 48 weeks before the two dose as the basis for immunization, after two doses as immunization. The results showed that different mosaic vaccine inoculation protocols were well tolerated (no adverse reactions) and could produce an immune response to HIV in healthy adults. What is worth mentioning is that in previous animal studies, the most protective vaccination program produced the greatest immune response in this trial.In the big reports, the claim that 100% produced antibodies against HIV is not accurate. The original results only refer to a cellular response or an antibody response, which does not indicate that the antibodies produced by the vaccine are effective against hiv. Therefore, some “against AIDS no longer need condoms” title is entirely misreading. Photo:healthline.comThe immune response we usually refer to is a series of defensive reactions produced by the body against foreign substances or variants of its own components. In most cases, this immune response produces a self-protection effect to achieve the goal of eliminating the alien, but producing an immune response is not equivalent to achieving effective protection.For example, when our eyes are in the sand, we may blink and shed tears. That’s a reaction, but can this reaction clear the sand? Maybe - tears are pouring out of the sand, but it may not. Therefore, responding does not mean that it can resist foreign substances.Therefore, the ability to initiate an immune response to HIV does not necessarily mean that the vaccine regimen could prevent the infection of hiv. The success of the main role is for the next implementation of further clinical trials to assess the vaccine to provide support, as the chief researcher APPROACH Dan Balloch (Dan Barouch), said: “the early research results of this study support further evaluation of these vaccine candidates, to estimate its ability to protect susceptible population for the hiv.” And a of this scheme for the study of TRAVERSE is expected to be completed by the end of 2017, at the same time, clinical trials in a larger population in the plan, such as the smooth progress, is expected in late 2017 or 2018 to recruit subjects. Clinical trials go through several stages, each with different aims, subjects, and durations. The trial is still in the 1/2a phase. Photograph: cancerinstitute.org.auThere is a part of the data also caused widespread concern: “subjects single exposure to the AIDS virus (HIV) infection risk was reduced by 94%, and there are 66% people in the 6 exposure to HIV is still protected, not infected by HIV.” In fact, this part of the data is for monkeys, not for human trials. In an animal trial of the previous vaccine, one of the effective vaccination programmes reduced the risk of infection by a single exposure to SHIV by 94%, and 66% of the monkeys remained infected after six exposures. Notice, monkeys here. They’re not infected with HIV, and they’re using SHIV, a recombinant virus of SIV and HIV.Sum up:This study is an early population trial of a new vaccine that is still in its early stages;The results of the study are optimistic and indeed play a crucial role in the development of HIV vaccines;The results of the study need to be confirmed by further large-scale clinical trials;The vaccine caused an antibody response in the human body, but it does not say the vaccine could fight HIV or aids.How difficult is the HIV vaccine?More than 30 years ago, scientists discovered the HIV virus, but until now, there is still no vaccine effective against the virus. Not without trying, but with difficulties.Vaccine development from the process of listing to itself is very long, and for the HIV vaccine, it is even more difficult. HIV virus mainly attacks the immune system of the human body, and the process of producing antibodies is inseparable from the immune system, the immune system damage, immune dysfunction, is often the main reason for vaccination failure. So far, there has been no case of self-healing after HIV infection, which may indicate that the HIV system alone is unable to suppress and eliminate the virus.This is not the worst. Our body’s resistance to HIV relies mainly on cytotoxic T lymphocytes (cytotoxic, lymphocyte, CTL), which secrete a variety of cytokines that are involved in the immune response. In the fight against HIV, its main function is to kill the cells invaded by the HIV virus, thereby terminating the breeding of HIV. However, none of the vaccines we currently develop can effectively activate it.Variation in the virus is also an important factor in vaccine development. The HIV virus is not only very fast but also has an amazing reproductive rate (producing 1 billion new viruses per day). The traditional vaccine research and development approach is difficult to solve this problem, we must change the way of thinking, another way to develop HIV vaccine. The incubation period of AIDS for years or decades is a major resistance to vaccine research and development. Because, in such a long incubation period, HIV infection has always been there, the susceptible population of HIV (in fact, almost all of them) have continued exposure risk of long-term, even developed HIV vaccine can produce protective antibody, but whether in the long-term threat that can hold a need to consider the issue.This is not the first HIV vaccine to enter clinical trials, but there is still no vaccine available, and the absence of a suitable HIV animal model is also an important issue. The current animal models are monkeys, but they are not infected with HIV, so they can only be tested with the SHIV virus. As a result, even if the animal test works well, the human body may not be that way.How far is the HIV vaccine from us?There are many kinds of HIV vaccines in the research and development phase, some of which are prophylactic vaccines to help the immune system prevent infection, and some are therapeutic vaccines to help the infected people clean up the infection. 9 kinds of HIV vaccine design icon, starting from the top left, clockwise order of the inactivated virus vaccine, synthetic peptide vaccines, recombinant virus vector vaccine (the mosaic vaccine is such), DNA vaccine, broadly neutralizing antibodies, virus like particles vaccine, recombinant bacterial vector vaccine, subunit vaccine and attenuated vaccine. To date, only four HIV vaccine concepts have been tested on human effectiveness in the world, and their vaccine will soon become the fifth.This mosaic vaccine is indeed a very promising one at the moment, but even if phase 2B clinical trials are successful, 3 trials and longer assessments will be available for future marketing. In other words, the distance from the real can be widely used AIDS vaccine, is still far from it?. (edit: Odette)This article is from Phoenix, representing Phoenix from the media point of view.

It looks deserted here. Land is bare, Tan, but also rich in minerals, so people build evaporation ponds here to produce related products. The evaporation pool is 400 acres, with twenty-seven colorful ponds. The main thing that this evaporation pool produces is sylvite, which is one of the common fertilizers in agricultural production.Potassium is a necessary nutrient for the growth of crops, so the demand is very large, but not every place can produce potassium salt, and here is one of them. The Qaidam Basin in the interior of China is also one of the famous potash producing areas. The strange appearance of the blue is that the evaporation pool is added to the dye, and the deep blue dye is added to the saturated potassium brine to accelerate the absorption of heat, thus gradually crystallizing the potash. The color of each pond represents a different state of evaporation. The light color indicates that a large amount of salt has been precipitated, and that the tan pond is almost dry, and the potash crystals (final products) remain in the pond and are ready to collect.
